website_summaries.verdict: This baby toothbrush is easy for baby to hold and wide and short enough that baby won't gag.
pros: Babies enjoy chewing on this brush
cons: The bristles are thick, making them a little difficult to use with tooth gel rather than paste

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Teether!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 months old and loves this teether! It is easy to clean (I have hand washed and machine washed without concerns) and is easy to hang onto. My daughter actually gets excited when she sees this toy and offers entertainment for her. I usually keep this in the freezer. It doesn't get very cold or stay cold for long, buy my daughter doesn't seem to mind. I have read that these types of toys (the teethers with brushes on them) are very popular to teething babies because their gums can feel itchy - this toy helps with that! Highly recommend! Biggest con: this toy is silicon, so everything sticks to it....including dog hair!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Was sceptical upon seeing in person but glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the length that was allowed to fit in the babies mouth because my daughter will end up gagging if the pacifier is the wrong shape so I didn't want her choking on the toy at all. I monitored the first couple times she used it and she didn't seem to have any problems at all, and she likes it, so, bonus points lol. I washed it before and I wash it after every time she uses it so the toothbrush part doesn't get filled with fuzzies. It's not too bad to clean, definitely better than cleaning an actual toothbrush. All in all, I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves this thing! She doesn't use any other teether toys I have bought her. She's not super coordinated with her hands yet, so sometimes she has trouble hanging on to it, but when she can manage to keep ahold of it she loves to chew on it. I imagine the better she gets with her hands, the more she will use it. Besides being an awesome teether and a first toothbrush, it is super cute! The only small downside is it does gather a lot of hair when it gets dropped, but it easy to rinse off so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: AshKum

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite teether
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this 'toothbrush' advertised for a long time, but thought the price was way too steep for such a little item. Eventually, my curiosity got the best of me after reading reviews, etc. and hoping my daughter would actually like it. It is certainty worth the money, especially if your little one is teething. The first time I gave her this, she probably chewed on it for 30 or 45 minutes straight. Slobber was everywhere (she was cutting teeth at the time), so for her it was perfect. The entire thing is soft, pliable, and ok to chew on. It is very well made. I only wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it for teething, brushing the dog and pulling hair out of the carpet. 5 stars as a tether, but the difficulty of removing our Great Pyrenees dog’s fur, and other collected hair specimens from the bristles and handle dropped my rating. If this was my first child I could’ve used the case and only let her have it under supervision, but she’s my fourth so that wasn’t feasible. The case was lost in the first 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This couldn’t have come at a better time! My 1 yr old is cutting 3 more teeth at the same time and she (and us) have been miserable. As soon as we got this, unwrapped and washed it, she hasn’t put it down! She needed to eat and I had to take this from her in order to feed her... she wasn’t happy about that 😂. Thank goodness for this teething toothbrush! So easy for her to hold too!! We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Earth's Own Bath & Body

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grab and fits in baby’s mouth as teether!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. She’s had it since she was 4 months old, she uses it as a teether for now of course, but it has always been so easy for her to grab! She’s always gotten frustrated trying to get big toys in her mouth so I was looking for something like a finger (she loves fingers) and this is perfect!! The handles let the banana go just far enough into her mouth she throughly enjoys this toy. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Okay, BUT..
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is really cute, I love the concept of it, BUT it gets dirty so quickly I can not put it in my diaper bag without everything sticking to it. I clean it after every use, but the material just collects any small debris and gets stuck on it. However it is easy to clean under running water.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Meza

customer_reviews.title: Very good teething toy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. My daughter used to casually gnaw on this banana from time to time. Now "stuff" is getting real and she's cutting ALL FOUR TOP FRONT TEETH at once (ugh, babies. they don't make the best decisions, do they?.) When I held this up to her tonight she was visibly excited and relieved and immediately gnawed for a good 5 minutes solid without stopping. I like the pink version. I can't comment for sure but I suspect the yellow version would offer just as much relief and joy.
customer_reviews.author: eewerra

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething babies!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! She picks it over every other toy and is always gnawing on it. I love how short it is on either side because it prevents choking! The only downside would be it collects lint quickly because of the material but you can easily rinse it under water and it's like new. My mom's already buying her the corn tether because she liked the banana so much.
customer_reviews.author: FieryWoman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny mouths!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this banana for my little sweetie, because she started teething and her hands always in her mouth. And we went through so many different teethers but my baby's mouth is so small that none of those feet in it comfortably for her. So I decided to give this banana a try! It's just perfect! It's pretty thin so my baby can comfortably put it in her mouth and chew on it, and it's really soft all over! We just love it! Most perfect teether ever! And of course the design is simply cute! Highly recommend to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit in our house
customer_reviews.text: My son has the yellow one and loves it, so when he started handing it to our newest little one, and she liked it too, I got her the pink one so there would be no confusion or arguing (mainly from my toddler) that they have each other's bananas. My daughter is clearly another banana lover. Big hit in our house! The only downfall is that the little bristles can be chewed off. They are so tiny that they haven't caused a problem but my toddler has since removed all of his bristles. But still loves it all the same! He won't sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great for molars!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 month old who is cutting her molars. I like that this is small enough to reach back to her molars but the little handles keep her from choking herself on it. The bristles get dirty easily and I have to rinse in often and rub my finger over the bristles for a bit to get in between the bristles clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical with these brushes because they don't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical with these brushes because they don't seem very functional. But after failing with everything other infant tooth brushes lve bought and tried, I eventually turn to this one . Amazingly this is the only brush my daughter would take and put in her mouth. Although there's not so much brushing going on but rather gnawing and chewing, but hey, at least it's on her teeth, I'll take that as brushing just as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunting

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves these. She is 11 months old and teething pretty bad. We throw these in the freezer and they will last about 10 minutes or so with soothing her gums. We now have bought 4. I do wish there where bristles on the peeling part of the banana through as well to help.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Just recieved it. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old granddaughter just recieved this. I gave it to her and she immediately loved it. Of course I wouldn't give this to her once she has a few teeth and can chew on the pieces, which is what I see of a few reviews. This is for babies who don't have a lot of teeth or no teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s 1st toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter once she got teeth. We use it twice a day, morning & night. She can easily put her fingers through the loops to hold it. She chews on it and moves it through her mouth. So far even her biting down on it, it is still in perfect shape. Soft enough on her tender gums but the bristles also help to clean her teeth. Great little starter brush.
customer_reviews.author: SCgemini

customer_reviews.title: Infant's Favorite Teether
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month olds favorite teether. She can hold the loops and clearly enjoys chewing on both ends. Easy to clean too. Everything comes out of the bristles easily. I've bought multiple.
customer_reviews.author: KatieHernandez

customer_reviews.title: Throw out when bristles start coming off
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved chewing this even up into toddlerhood. But I had to eventually throw it away when I noticed a couple bristles missing (meaning she was able to chew them off)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Instant favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old loves this! She will use it for a good 30 minutes at a time. It is very easy for her to hold and maneuver and she likes every side of it: the bristles, the bottom which has little nubs, and even the handles. My favorite part is that she has yet to choke on it. We have other teethers that have parts just long enough to gag her, but not this one. Very smart design. Definately recommend for all teething babies!
customer_reviews.author: JTRMZ07

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold, wonderful teether for infants
customer_reviews.text: This banana teether is easy for an infant (4+mos) to hold, & massage gums while teething. Just brought third one for my third grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: true60

customer_reviews.title: Good for teething
customer_reviews.text: Decent for teething , brush head size is perfect however I wish the handles to hold were a bit bigger . Overall a good product. Our daughter didn’t show much interest until around 5-6 months which makes sense given the teething age.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn Souders

customer_reviews.title: Easy for baby to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, just the right size teether for aching gums, and works especially good if stored in the freezer and given to baby icy cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Teether
customer_reviews.text: Best teether. My toddler is always trying to take it from the baby. It’s the easiest to hold and soothes apparently both of their gums. I have bought three and will buy these for all my first time moms.
customer_reviews.author: Praise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Perfect starter toothbrush. Bought for my daughter so she could get used to me brushing her teeth before we started using a real toothbrush. I've always used soft wet sterile gauze to clean her mouth. She loves to bite on this thing! I still let her bite on this even though we use a real toothbrush now. I found it to be safe for my daughter to chew on supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie's True Review

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn't teething yet but loves to chew. We got her this and it is super easy for her to hold. (A pacifier clip works great on this so you can clip it to their clothes!) Also so easy to clean! Only con is that we have dogs and the dog hair loves to stick to the toy. But since it's so easy to clean I don't mind at all
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Let them use it when they are little
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn’t have waited so long to give to my baby. I waited until she was almost one. Should have given it to her when she was six or seven months old. She mostly chews on it for half a second and throws it on the ground. It seems a little small for her to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter really likes this! I had bought one 2 years ago for my older daughter, and definitely prefer this one. This one is much easier to get any hair or fuzzies out of!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when my baby was tiny and just starting to get her teeth, and she still loves it now at 16 months. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite teething toy and it looks so cute when she uses it. Its very durable and easy to hold. Its just that the bristle catches fiber easily which gets hard to clean. Then again, its normal to get fibers stuck to bristles or brushes. Overall its great for baby.
customer_reviews.author: William L Romine

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Love that it’s easy to use and clean. Baby loves it— seems to soothe her for teething. One obvious thing, don’t leave baby unattended with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrlll

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: my little girl is not interested in this I was hoping she would like it but she didn't want it I know every kid is different but it was a disappointment to find out she doesn't like it
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: love this! wich i got one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old and I wish I would have gotten it sooner. She absolutely loves it. I find her all the time chewing on it. its made of durable soft rubber so I don't worry about her biting the small bristles off. it has helped get her used to brushing her teeth as well. we use a (regular toothbrush for that though) I recommend this product highly for any teething toddlers. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Syla's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Broke - Dangerous for babies!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this teething banana, but following several months of use several of the bristles broke off. I can only assume my baby ingested them. I noted another consumer had the same problem. This is a serious concern. This product is potentially quite dangerous, especially for younger babies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great teether and toy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the first toys I gave to my baby when she was just a couple months old. Very quickly she learned how to hold it and put it in her mouth. She is now 8 months old and this is still one of her favorites. Her cousin, who is a year old, found it while they were playing one day and also loved it. Needless to say my sister ordered one immediately! I would highly recommend this for any baby.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor King

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to be discontinued. The pieces come off. Now I can’t use it or get my money back and my child probably swallowed plastic pieces
customer_reviews.author: booksreviewgrou

customer_reviews.title: Great first toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl only has one tooth so far and this is a great first tooth brush. I give it to her while im brushing my teeth, so she knows she should be brushing hers too. She loves it and wants to use it as a teether but I always take it away and only give it to her once in the morning and once at night.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Teething Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Both of my littles love this banana. I love it because I can brush their teeth, and they love it because it helps with teething (my poor kiddos always get two teeth simultaneously). The bristle side is soft and squishy for brushing, while the opposite end is a little more hard with raised bumps for gnawing/teething.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boone Valkenburg

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely loves this! It is easy for her to hold and she could chew on it for a while without getting tired of it. She is 6 months old and her gums bother her from time to time. I usually will put a bit of teething oil on the banana when she is getting irritated by her gums and let her go to town chewing on it. It really helps. And I am hoping that once she has teeth this will help us ease into brushing smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: kcamel88

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: I purchase quite a bit on Amazon and rely heavily on reviews but forget to review myself so here goes; I purchased this for my granddaughter when she was 4 mths old. She LOVES, so much so I purchased a second one to keep at my home for her. Big hit. As an extra tip we use a pacifier clip to attach this to her car seat, stroller, etc. This prevents drops and the “handle” of the banana is perfect for attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Shawntae Murphy

customer_reviews.title: CHOKING HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item for about a month. Until it started falling apart. My daughter doesn’t even have teeth!!! Literal pieces of it just breaking off!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sterilize, and carry around!!
customer_reviews.text: Brielle is 4 months old and she can really hold on to the banana still learning how to chew on it but I've used these banana teething toys for all my grandbabies !! Is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Terrii Later

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was teething and she used to be cranky all the time. I ordered this and it helped a lot. Now she use this almost whole day.
customer_reviews.author: @mit

customer_reviews.title: Love,Love,Love!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old baby absolutely loves this banana! Its easy for her to hold and it's something she actually loves it. She can be picky sometimes so this is a picky kids pick
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Some people swear by it so I had to try it. I'm not sure how effective the bristles are and the handles are pretty difficult for my 6mth old to hold, so it's a bit of a dust collecter. Soft and good quality tho, so I see how others like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A toddler must have!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this! She chews it for hours and it keeps her busy. It would be nice if it came with a leash but otherwise an all around awesome teethed for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good teething toy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this! We bought it when she was 4 months old, and she didn’t really take to it until now. Only down side is that it does collect hair easily if dropped on the floor. So it needs to be rinsed every now and then. But she really enjoys chewing on all angles of it.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: My twins and toddler love these. My twins are 5 months and have no problem holding these on their own. I also just throw them in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Empty Double You

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom myself and enjoy giving gifts that new mothers wouldn't think to put on their registry but things that made my life easier. This is one of those things, baby's first toothbrush! It's super easy for baby to hold and chew on and start good habits young!
customer_reviews.author: Toni A. Wetrich

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, excellent quality, helps teething baby immensely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when she was cutting her first tooth. It helped her immensely!! She now just cut her second tooth, and it has helped just as well. I can dump out her whole toy box, and this is the first thing she grabs. Excellent quality, and one of the best things I have spent money on. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha CB

customer_reviews.title: Babies love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby’s favorite teething item. I keep them in the freezer. This is the only thing I can’t take away from my baby without her getting mad :) Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma2.4

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: My six month old LOVES this. Such a good cheap toy. Easy for her to hold, and must feel great on her gums bc she uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great teething toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes chewing on her toothbrush, so I got her this to chew on instead and she loves it! It’s very sticky so it accumulates dirt and hair quickly, but a quick wash off and it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my precious little great niece who's about 9 months old. She really likes it and has no problem hanging onto it. it's cute too.
customer_reviews.author: ImBradWTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething.
customer_reviews.text: A good teething tip that I found to be super for my daughter is to get the brush part wet and put in the freezer for a while and then she LOVES chewing on it. Seems to really help with her teething discomfort. Also is a great way to introduce the idea of brushing teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product except
customer_reviews.text: Great product except that it attracts lent, dust, hair, dirt. If it falls into her car seat or stroller or anyplace that has lent/dirt/crumbs, I have to wash rinse it before I give it back to her.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for teething baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My little girl loves it & chews on it constantly. It’s little handles are perfect for her to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Dohrman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold. Firm (but has slight give) density.
customer_reviews.text: Baby (and all that I've gifted to) have loved this. It's easy for baby to hold and has a good balance of firm and soft for texture. (Not a rock, has give, but less give than Sophie the Giraffe). Baby liked it better than Sophie while she was younger (easier to grab), and now they're about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 6 months and chews on this banana every day at least twice. We have all the teethers, get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: mandarella

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: She loves this banana more than any of her other toys. So glad we picked it up! Her tiny fingers fit in the little handles and she just chews on it like crazy. No signs of wear on the toy at all, either.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Training Teether
customer_reviews.text: My baby's favorite teether. Easy to hold and clean! Every time we give her this teether it keeps her from biting other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hair in my baby's toothbrush!!
customer_reviews.text: Item came with a hair follicle packaged in the toothbrush bristles. Where is the quality control??
customer_reviews.author: M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: The second j gave it to her she was super happy massaging her gums with it
customer_reviews.text: Just received the rubbery/silicone toothe brush , my baby almost a year has about 6 teeth coming in , she never took pacifier last night she practically fell asleep with it . The second j gave it to her she was super happy massaging her gums with it , she doesn't love teething toys , this one is GOLDEN :) I would recommend to anyone to get it , it's worth the price and especially how it relaxes her teething phase , if your baby won't let you brush your teeth with this they will do it themselves :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best teethers we've owned. My 6 month old loves it and it works well with reaching the back teeth. Definitely a must have for anyone with a teething baby.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Good for teething
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, now I’m buying this again for my daughter. My son loved it, but my daughter didn’t show much of interest.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie H

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old grandchild & parents love this!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old grandchild loves tis item I carefully chose. It lets her become accustomed to the feel of a brush! Of course she likes to teeth with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Snow Huskys!

customer_reviews.title: Great teether
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite teether. Soft and bendy. The little bristles help massage her gums and the handles provide great support for those just learning how to use their hands. A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is teething and this has helped her adjust to the dealing with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it is easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: ashley_mo15

customer_reviews.title: Baby teething must have!
customer_reviews.text: My babies love chewing on this while their teeth start to come in, they are 5 months old!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Laino

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to hold and teeth on this banana. I and very glad I invested in it. I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best teething toy out there
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter prefers this to all other teething toys she has. plus its a great way to introduce her to brushing teeth, when they come in. It does seem to relieve her gums and its easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shanwhit

customer_reviews.title: Cute teether!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute teether and my daughter loves to practice brushing her teeth. It is also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sinnitta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: !!️UPDATE!!️ we have had ours for about 6 months now and she still loves it just as much as she did the day we got it! It is holding up great no wear at all! She loves this so much more then her Sophie the giraffe.
customer_reviews.author: Cαsιℰ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect started toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter toothbrush! My little one absolutely loves it. Super easy to use, and just as easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: KailaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and my LO loves to chew on this. It hasn't helped us brush yet as still no teeth but certainly helps to ease the teething. I will be a bit wary once babe gets teeth as I've read reviews about the bristles coming off but at that point I can see us using this more to brush than to teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this! It's super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves to hold this, and it really helps her with teething. Easy to clean also. Would highly recommend! Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's great for her to hold on to
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a chew toy for our baby, it's great for her to hold on to, and I like that I can throw it into the dishwasher or easily sanitize it in hot water unlike other chew toys that have fabric on them or water inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: We're building positive ideas around tooth brushing with this attractive, easy to use toothbrush
customer_reviews.author: All Is Well

customer_reviews.title: It's not an actual toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved it. Just a warning, it doesn't have bristles, it's just more of a teething toy than a toothbrush. I didn't read carefully so I had to go and get another toothbrush for her but she did end u using it for teething so it was worth it. It was a little small for the price but no a deal-breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought for my twin girls ( 9 months)! They love these things! I've bought backups bc they love them so much! Absolutely adorable and the brush their teeth (7 each). I sterilize daily in the dishwasher and so far they have held up great !!! I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teethers
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves it and it does help them to accept the toothbrush later on. I had one for my older child and it worked really well. I put it in the freezer for added comfort foe those sore gums, though it doesnt stay cold for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Puppylove85

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves
customer_reviews.text: This is my second child who loves this banana. easy for her to hold and safe for her to chew on
customer_reviews.author: JRast

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. Only complaint is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Only complaint is that it is hard to clean. The bristles catch hair and whatever other grime my daughter picks up and its hard to glean. I've hand washed and thrown in the dishwasher. It definitely takes a little scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Dub

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter when she was teething ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when she was teething. It really helped at first but now that she has 4 top teeth and 2 bottom teeth she’s started biting the ridges off and trying to eat them. It lasted her a few months but it’s time to throw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Banana teether
customer_reviews.text: Wow, amazing product for teething babies. My 6 months daughter started chewing on it right away. The banana peel handles are very easy to hold for her tiny hands. The whole toothbrush/teether is made of soft rubber material. She can chew it from anywhere. The handles prevents the baby from taking it to deep in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Waseem

customer_reviews.title: It's easy for her to hold and she seems to enjoy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7-month old, teething, grandbaby's go-to toy. It's not really a toy but I figure it can't hurt that she wants it in her mouth several times a day. It's easy for her to hold and she seems to enjoy the way it feels in her mouth. I think adding toothpaste will be an easy transition. Its pricey for a toothbrush but I think a good investment in her oral health.
customer_reviews.author: Intrepid Fox

customer_reviews.title: They all love it bc their children like using it
customer_reviews.text: I have given this to three new mothers. They all love it bc their children like using it . They don't realize it's a toothbrush and consider it a toy. They ask to brush their teeth several times a day
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Pink banana pink banana
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves the bristles against her gums. She prefers this over some of her other teething toys. She hasn't popped any teeth yet, but this seems to satisfy her teething needs. It's really easy for her to hold onto and it keeps her entertained for quite a while. I like that you can loop a dropper-stopper around the handle to prevent it from dropping to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: licketysplit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. Its easy to hold and the perfect size to fit in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Seems like every one of her cartoon/song compilations has a tooth brushing song, and any time one comes on she runs squealing to go get her toothbrush to brush along with the show.
customer_reviews.author: Vendetta

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: Right to the mouth and chewing ... Hands help baby hold , my grand baby loves this !
customer_reviews.author: CSD

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this little teaser
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this little teaser. She still plays with it now and she has a mouth full of teeth. It's firm but soft therefore I don't have to worry about her hurting her teeth and it provided the satisfaction she needed when her gums were itching or in need of pressure
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teether for my 4mo old
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not buy this sooner?! My 4mo old has been teething for a month and none of the standard teethers fit her little mouth. This is perfect for her. The white brush part is about the size of half an adult finger so she can reach back molars. Still need to be careful bc she has gagged herself with it. Wish my Aunt told me about it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great teether!
customer_reviews.text: My baby started teething from four month. That was when I offered him this banana teether and so many other different ones. He is now eight month still love this teether best!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my niece. She was teething really bad and was the only thing that would reach the back gums. Super easy to clean. The moment I gave it to her she went to town. It is one of her favorite teethers. BONUS!!!! Its a tooth brush.
customer_reviews.author: sldjfgojsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for baby girl.
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby girl’s favorite thing. She loves to brush her teeth with this, and easy for her to hold on to and use. 11 months old and has 10 teeth, my poor girl.
customer_reviews.author: Alice A

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves chewing it! It's easy for her to hold and works well with soothing her teething aches (I think anyway, she seems to enjoy munching on it). Very simple to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this I use this on my daughter every morning and night. She loves to just bit it as hard as she can hahaha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this thing. It’s so perfect for her sore little gums. Awesome product!

product_meta.title: Baby Banana - Pink Banana Toothbrush, Training Teether Tooth Brush for Infant, Baby, and Toddler
product_meta.description: Color:Pink and WhiteAbout the Pink Banana Toothbrush: Baby Banana's Pink Banana Brush is an infant teething toy and training toothbrush in one. Made of 100% food-grade silicone, this adorable banana will make brushing exciting! Specifically designed with "a-peel-ing" handles that are easy for baby to hold, while preventing choking. There are no hard parts, pieces, or glue. The brush can be easily tossed in the dishwasher for cleanup or placed in the freezer to provide cool soothing relief. Baby Banana is completely non-toxic, BPA free, phthalate-free, lead-free, 100% food-grade silicone. Brings teething and brushing together, helping babies to develop healthy oral care habits from the earliest age possible, literally taking dental care "into their own hands.About Baby Banana: Baby Banana has worked long and hard to create a safe toothbrush for babies and children. These soft and flexible toothbrushes and teethers have been sold all over, keeping millions of little mouths safe while helping them to learn good oral care habits early on. As the company has grown, Baby Banana has remained a family business that is constantly working to carry on the vision of creating safe, soft, flexible, and fun products for kids.
feature_bullets: GENTLE MASSAGING - Baby Banana toothbrushes gently massage teeth and gums. The soft, flexible brush helps protect young mouths that are still learning the habits of oral care. The peel handles make it easy to clean and prevent choking.

SOFT SILICONE - The flexible silicone material used to make these products help reduce the risk of mouth injury. These products are BPA, latex, and phthalate-free, so they are perfectly safe for babies and newborn children.

ORAL HYGIENE HABITS - Baby Banana training brushes help to develop good oral hygiene habits at a very young age. When not being used to cleanse your baby's mouth, the brush makes a great toy for playing and teething.

EASY TO CLEAN - Because these toothbrush teethers are made of silicone, they are dishwasher safe, making them super easy to clean! To help with a sore gum or mouth, these brushes can be placed in the freezer before use.

AGES 3 TO 12 MONTHS - Great for babies and infants, this toy works great for 12-month-old children and younger. Both boy and girl babies can enjoy the company of the Pink Banana Brush as they develop and grow.
